timeseries.name: CPI
timeseries.info: Consumer Prices Index (CPI) Annual Rate Percentage Change Over 12 Months
timeseries.explanation: Change in the 12 month rate since last month.

statsBulletinHeadlines.text: CPI grew by 1.5% in year to August 2014
Down from 1.6% in year to July 2014
Falls in the prices of motor fuels and food & non-alcoholic drinks provided the largest downward contributions to the change
Largest, upward effects came from clothing, transport services and alcohol

timeseries.name: RPIJ
timeseries.info: Retail Prices Index calculated using the Jevons formula (RPIJ) Annual Rate Percentage Change Over 12 Months

lede: Latest Consumer Price Indices including CPI, CPIH, RPI and RPIJ as well as Producer Price Indices and other inflation statistics.
more: Some more content goes here. This will expand and contract if you have JS enabled. If JS is disabled, this will show by default. Yay progressive enhancement!
name: Inflation and Price Indices
